snippet: Maddie Bowman followed up her gold at the X Games with another in ski halfpipe at the United States Grand Prix in Park City, Utah.
abstract: Halfpipe skier Maddie Bowman wins gold at United States Grand Prix in Park City, Utah; other winter sports news noted.
lead_paragraph: Maddie Bowman followed up her gold at the X Games with another in ski halfpipe at the United States Grand Prix in Park City, Utah.

headline.main: Bowman Wins at U.S. Grand Prix
headline.print_headline: Bowman Wins at U.S. Grand Prix
